abstract: Applications now being accepted for the International Festival of Fashion and Photography.
snippet: Applications now being accepted for the International Festival of Fashion and Photography.
lead_paragraph: The International Festival of Fashion and Photography takes place each spring at the Villa Noailles near Hyeres, in the south of France. Viktor & Rolf and Romain Kremer are among the designers who participated in the competition. Jury leaders have included Martin Margiela, Azzedine Alaia, Raf Simons and Hussein Chalayan. The Hyeres Festival is an excellent way for emerging designers and photographers to get some recognition. The deadline for applications for the spring 2012 festival is Dec. 5. So apply! For details, go to villanoailles-hyeres.com/hyeres2012.
